question:
Which of the following statements about alluvial soils of India are correct?
1. These are mostly clay soils and form deep cracks during the dry season
2. They are very productive soils in nature
3. These soils occur at high elevations as well as at low elevations
4. It is deficient in nitrogen, humus and phosphorus
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: The alluvial soil is found in all over the plains of north India. It is also found in the south delta regions. Strips of alluvium occur along rivers in the plateau as well as in the mountains. Alluviums are the mixtures of sand and clay.
